title: GUT REHAB 1 BED LOFT DUPLEX W/D in Unit. See Video Below.
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', '944 W Grace - Video is Model Unit -https://youtu.be/CmVNS8C1Duo', 'Rent: $2,495 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/15/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Completely renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom duplex in Lakeview / Wrigleyville available now!', 'Great location just north of Wrigley Field, easy access to the Red Line at Sheridan or Addison, 1 block to the Wrigley bleachers, and near all the great Wrigleyville shops, bars and restaurants.', 'Unit features include:', '- Brand new granite kitchen with breakfast bar', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Dishwasher and microwave', '- Washer/dryer in unit', '- Large living room with working electric fireplace', '- Spacious ground floor patio with privacy partition', '- King-sized bedroom upstairs with lots of closet space', '- New marble bathroom', '- Huge windows and tons of natural light', '- Central air conditioning and central heat', '- Secured, gated parking for rent ($200/mo)', '- Pets welcome!', 'FEATURES', 'Bike Storage', 'The Square One Team', '3223 N. Sheffield', 'Chicago, IL 60657', '<URL>', 'Leasing Agent:  Absalom Givens', 'License #: 473018524', 'Phone: (708) 495 -1137']
